label_playback_tempo_title: Playback speed – does not change project BPM or grid
info_local_data: This app processes all data locally on your device.
info_rhyme_prefix: When using the rhyme feature, entered words are sent to the external service
info_no_personal_data: No other personal data is transmitted.
shortcut_backspace: Cursor to loop start / custom arrangement start
modal_marker_help_text:
Working on your song and need to nail down one section, but keep having to scrub back and forth in the player? Just loop it! 

Create as many markers as you like and drag them into position. 

Use the Snap Grid feature to align them perfectly for clean loops. 

Name your markers freely for a clear overview of the arrangement. Double-tap to rename.

Tap markers to activate or deactivate them. Two red markers create a loop. 

An active loop automatically disables any custom arrangement.

Double-tapping Stop moves the cursor to the loop's start marker.
modal_seq_help_text:
Your instrumental only has one chorus at the end, but in your head two would sound better? Maybe you don't like the opening of the first verse, but there's a great spot in the second that could be twice as long? And what if that bridge came before the chorus instead of after? No problem! 

Activate Custom Arrangement and drag your marker sections into any order. 

Duplicate sections as many times as you like to build your ultimate beat. 

Mute sections you don't want – they'll be skipped entirely during playback. 

Export your custom arrangement as a WAV audio file to take into the studio. 

An active custom arrangement automatically disables loops.

Double-tapping Stop moves the cursor to the beginning of the arrangement.
modal_editor_help_text:
With the LoopCake Editor, your lyrics are always in full view and under full control!

The editor automatically calculates how many lines you need to write and always shows you exactly where you are in your song. 

The "Import Markers" button aligns your text arrangement precisely with your instrumental. 

Autoscroll keeps the right lyric line in focus even during live playback. 

Want to quickly loop a different section without changing your loop or custom arrangement? Hold down the line number of a lyric line – two red numbers create a Quick Loop. Hold one of them again to end the Quick Loop. 

Or tap a line number once to instantly jump playback to that point. 

Need a rhyme for a line? Activate the RhymeBrain integration and tap any word in your lyrics to get suggestions! 

Use the Export button to display your finished lyrics in full and copy them to the clipboard!
js_prompt_project_name: Enter a project name and then choose a folder
js_err_android: Could not open Android file picker:
js_waveform_help_text:
Load your audio file and set the BPM tempo and time signature. 

Move the cursor via drag & drop, or by tapping in the timeline. 

Zoom and scroll with touch gestures. 

Trim empty sections at the start or end using the Trim buttons.

Disable the Snap Grid feature for more precise positioning.
js_no_audio: Please load an audio file first.
js_load_matching_audio: Now load the matching audio file
js_no_bpm: Please set BPM to calculate the arrangement.
js_no_segments: No usable segments found in custom arrangement.
